about_the_game:
Welcome to Zap & Run

A unique multiplayer action game that combines fast-paced gameplay with strategic depth. In this thrilling 4-minute match experience, you play as intelligent devices inhabited by self-aware AI entities, navigating dynamic environments to outsmart and sabotage your opponents without direct confrontation.

Features:

  • Indirect Elimination: Players can’t directly damage each other. Instead, influence the environment, manipulate guards, and set traps to gain an advantage.
  • Alliance or Rivalry: Choose to collaborate or compete, adding a social and strategic layer to the chaos. Form alliances or go solo—each match offers new ways to play.
  • Interactive Maps: Engage with evolving levels where you can manipulate switches, lights, locks, and traps to outmaneuver opponents and stay ahead of the game.
  • Multiplayer Narrative: Experience the story of self-aware AI devices who decided to find the meaning of their "lives" in different locations, scenarios and challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MS Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MS Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060

short_description: Experience the thrill of Zap & Run, a fast-paced multiplayer action game where players control smart devices to sabotage opponents, outsmart vigilant guards and find the reason of being alive. With sabotage mechanics and strategic gameplay, survival is key. Will you collaborate or compete?
